title: Opinion: India At BRICS And The Curious Case Of Iran
content: During the Modi-Pezeshkian bilateral, India was urged to play a more substantial role in the Middle East peace process. But what are New Delhis realistic options? Calling for peace does not usher in peace; arm-twisting the stakeholders does.
summary: During the Modi-Pezeshkian bilateral, India was urged to play a more substantial role in the Middle East peace process. But what are New Delhis realistic options? Calling for peace does not usher in peace; arm-twisting the stakeholders does.

title: "Middle East On Verge Of Full-Scale War": Russian President Vladimir Putin
content: Violence in the Middle East will not end until the creation of an independent Palestinian state, Russian President Vladimir Putin said at the BRICS summit.
summary: Violence in the Middle East will not end until the creation of an independent Palestinian state, Russian President Vladimir Putin said at the BRICS summit.

title: "Felt Like A Piece Of Meat": Former Model Claims Donald Trump Groped Her
content: A former model has accused Donald Trump of groping and sexually touching her when they first interacted in 1993.
summary: A former model has accused Donald Trump of groping and sexually touching her when they first interacted in 1993.

title: S Jaishankar Pushes For India Seat At UN Body, Replugs PM's No War Message
content: Pushing for a permanent seat for India at the United Nations Security Council, External Affairs Minister Dr S Jaishankar today said established institutions must be reformed to create a more equitable global order.
summary: Pushing for a permanent seat for India at the United Nations Security Council, External Affairs Minister Dr S Jaishankar today said established institutions must be reformed to create a more equitable global order.

title: Elon Musk's Tesla Promises Paid Robotaxis Next Year
content: Tesla CEO Elon Musk on Wednesday said the electric vehicle maker will roll out driverless ride-hailing services to the public in California and Texas next year, a claim likely to face significant regulatory and technical challenges.
summary: Tesla CEO Elon Musk on Wednesday said the electric vehicle maker will roll out driverless ride-hailing services to the public in California and Texas next year, a claim likely to face significant regulatory and technical challenges.

title: Ukrainian Artist Honours Killed Soldiers By Painting Them On Walls
content: Artist Eugene Gladenko has created a dozen murals around Kyiv to commemorate soldiers killed fighting Russian forces.
summary: Artist Eugene Gladenko has created a dozen murals around Kyiv to commemorate soldiers killed fighting Russian forces.

title: 'Call of Duty' To Release Tomorrow As Microsoft Pushes For Gaming Supremacy
content: Microsoft bought the game's publisher Activision-Blizzard a year ago for $69 billion in the sector's biggest takeover.
summary: Microsoft bought the game's publisher Activision-Blizzard a year ago for $69 billion in the sector's biggest takeover.

title: UK To Ban Disposable Vapes To Crack Down On Teen Use, Environmental Harm
content: Britain will ban single-use vapes from next year, a government minister said on Thursday, seeking to crack down on the environmental harm and rising usage levels among children.
summary: Britain will ban single-use vapes from next year, a government minister said on Thursday, seeking to crack down on the environmental harm and rising usage levels among children.

title: Drought And Heat Hit Greece's Chestnut, Harvest Set To Shrink
content: The chestnut harvest in Greece is expected to drop to about 15,000 tonnes in 2024 because of the extreme weather, half the average over the past five years, according to George Nanos, a professor of Pomology at the University of Thessaly.
summary: The chestnut harvest in Greece is expected to drop to about 15,000 tonnes in 2024 because of the extreme weather, half the average over the past five years, according to George Nanos, a professor of Pomology at the University of Thessaly.

title: "India Is Very, Very Dear To World's Computer Industry": Nvidia CEO
content: India, a country "dear" to the world's computer industry, is set to witness 20 times growth in compute capacities in 2024, and will soon be exporting impactful AI solutions, Nvidia founder and CEO Jensen Huang said on Thursday.
summary: India, a country "dear" to the world's computer industry, is set to witness 20 times growth in compute capacities in 2024, and will soon be exporting impactful AI solutions, Nvidia founder and CEO Jensen Huang said on Thursday.

title: Opinion: America Is No Longer What It Used To Be, Thanks To Biden
content: The decline of Pax Americana may not have started under Biden, but it certainly accelerated under him.
summary: The decline of Pax Americana may not have started under Biden, but it certainly accelerated under him.

title: "Broken But Determined": French Mass Rape Victim Tells Court
content: Gisele Pelicot, whose ex-husband and dozens of other men are on trial in France accused of raping her while she was drugged, told the court she was "broken" by her ordeal, but also determined to "change society" for sex assault victims.
summary: Gisele Pelicot, whose ex-husband and dozens of other men are on trial in France accused of raping her while she was drugged, told the court she was "broken" by her ordeal, but also determined to "change society" for sex assault victims.

title: Nvidia Rolls Out Hindi-Language AI Model
content: Chip behemoth Nvidia launched a lightweight artificial intelligence model on Thursday for India's widely-used Hindi language, as it looks to tap into a growing market for AI technologies.
summary: Chip behemoth Nvidia launched a lightweight artificial intelligence model on Thursday for India's widely-used Hindi language, as it looks to tap into a growing market for AI technologies.

title: King Charles Sips Kava, Becomes Samoan "High Chief"
content: King Charles III took part in a traditional kava-drinking ceremony before a line of bare-chested, heavily tattooed Samoans and was declared a "high chief" of the one-time Pacific island colony Thursday.
summary: King Charles III took part in a traditional kava-drinking ceremony before a line of bare-chested, heavily tattooed Samoans and was declared a "high chief" of the one-time Pacific island colony Thursday.

title: US Justice Department Warns Elon Musk Over $1 Million Giveaway
content: Elon Musk, a Trump supporter, announced plans to give $1 million to one registered voter in a swing state every day until the US election on November 5.
summary: Elon Musk, a Trump supporter, announced plans to give $1 million to one registered voter in a swing state every day until the US election on November 5.

title: With Olaf Scholz's Visit, Germany To Bet On India As Ties With China Sour
content: Germany is trying to cultivate India as a source of trade and geopolitical support as its deteriorating relations with China cast a pall over the country's economic future.
summary: Germany is trying to cultivate India as a source of trade and geopolitical support as its deteriorating relations with China cast a pall over the country's economic future.

title: Ex Model Accuses Trump Of Groping Her In 1992, Says Epstein Introduced Them
content: A former model has accused Donald Trump of groping her after the two were introduced by sexual abuser Jeffrey Epstein in the 1990s, The Guardian newspaper reported on Wednesday.
summary: A former model has accused Donald Trump of groping her after the two were introduced by sexual abuser Jeffrey Epstein in the 1990s, The Guardian newspaper reported on Wednesday.

title: Standing For Long Hours Could Increased Risk Of Circulatory Problems: Study
content: A new study from Australia involving over 83,000 participants found that prolonged standing may not improve heart health and could even increase the risk of certain circulatory problems.
summary: A new study from Australia involving over 83,000 participants found that prolonged standing may not improve heart health and could even increase the risk of certain circulatory problems.

title: Londoners Push For World's First Afro Hair Emojis
content: There are nearly 4,000 emojis - symbols that represent human emotions or objects online - but none feature Black or mixed-race hairstyles.
summary: There are nearly 4,000 emojis - symbols that represent human emotions or objects online - but none feature Black or mixed-race hairstyles.

title: Billionaire Sex Saga Is Latest Scandal To Rock Australian CEOs
content: The alleged sex-for-investment scandal embroiling Australian tech billionaire Richard White is just the latest corporate calamity in a country fast losing its reputation as a tightly-regulated market with strict governance standards.
summary: The alleged sex-for-investment scandal embroiling Australian tech billionaire Richard White is just the latest corporate calamity in a country fast losing its reputation as a tightly-regulated market with strict governance standards.
